extendedInfo.description: Prepare for a new standard in kid safe games. Featuring coloring & painting, HD graphics, and tablet centered design. Brought to you Ad-Free for Free!Kids Coloring & Painting is a unique art experience every time your child plays. There are untold combinations of canvas, extras, and coloring stencils to choose from. Your child will never tire of all the fun!Features:-Kid safe with absolutely zero: ads, external links, & purchasable items.-Create your own scene: pick a background, stickers, and coloring characters.-Back-Button will remove the last drawn line.-Save your drawings to the camera folder with 1 click.-Baby mode removes the toolbar. Random colors will be drawn or painted as the screen is swiped or tapped. The back button will return you to the main menu.Coming soon to Kids Coloring and Painting:-More backgrounds, extras, and coloring pages with every update!-Multitouch drawing with smooth, seamless lines. We appreciate your patience!Permissions Explained:This game requires the permission "WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE". This is only used for saving your screen(without the toolbar) to the pictures folder of your device.âFOLLOW USâ*Follow us on Twitter - @DMTSource*Like us on Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/DMTSource*Email - support@dmtsource.com*Website - http://dmtsource.com/If you have any suggestions or concerns please contact us, we hope to hear from you! DMT Source LLC is an Orlando, FL USA, based developer. Number Splash Theme song was created by Mason Taylor Allan.Kids Coloring & Painting redefines fun based education. With HD Tablet gameplay, smooth graphics and high educational value for tactile skills, Kids Coloring & Painting is the perfect way to teach & distract. Get it right now and let your kids experience the magic of art!

reviews.title: Mind blowing
reviews.comment: This game helps to be more creative. Create your own scene,pick a background, stickers, and coloring characters. Superb.
reviews.author: Tomas Ferrell

reviews.title: Does exactly what it says
reviews.comment: Very colorful and playful app for kids that I, as a teacher, can see them spending hours on. Well done!
reviews.author: Justin Clement

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: While reading the features I already understood that it will be an awesome game. And it didn\'t prove me wrong.
reviews.author: Antje Huber

reviews.title: Totally awesome
reviews.comment: Truly kid safe coloring and painting. It has created a new standard in kid safe games. A perfect game for the kids.
reviews.author: Alex Dayne

reviews.title: Loved it!
reviews.comment: I liked every single thing about this game. I will always want whenever my kids get time they will play and also learn from it.
reviews.author: Raymond Goldberg

reviews.title: Great fun!
reviews.comment: Great app to sit and doodle. Got this for my 5 year old, but ended up using it quite a bit myself.
reviews.author: Michael Meadows

reviews.title: Very attractive design!
reviews.comment: The HD graphics has took this game to another level. It is so beautifully designed because of that children get more attracted to it.
reviews.author: Steve Khmer

reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
reviews.comment: Thanks again DMT Source for an amazing product! Love your Number Splash game too. Keep up the great work.
reviews.author: Michelle Meadows

reviews.title: Brilliant idea!
reviews.comment: It is a unique art experience for kids who loves painting also those who don\'t. A fabulous game with an extraordinary art experience.
reviews.author: Jackson Hal

reviews.title: Easy and simple
reviews.comment: This is the most easiest and simplest way of learning painting and colouring. Kids will both enjoy and learn at a time.
reviews.author: Antonia Hopkins

reviews.title: Strong
reviews.comment: It has successfully made its place strong among thousands of kids\' games.
reviews.author: Alex Smith

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Though it is a game for kids but even I inspite of being an adult enjoy thorough while playing it. That\'s cool.
reviews.author: Andrew Bruce

reviews.title: Ad free and kid safe.
reviews.comment: Hope you enjoy this free kids coloring game!
reviews.author: Derek Tishler

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: So many things to do while playing one single game. It is full of fun,excitement and creativity. I liked it to the core.
reviews.author: Ryan Gibs

reviews.title: Magical
reviews.comment: In its description it says that get it right now and let your kids experience the magic of art. I totally agree with it. It is magical.
reviews.author: Roberto Henderson

reviews.title: Smooth graphics
reviews.comment: It has smooth graphics and teaches high educational value for tactile skill. It is the perfect way to teach & distract.
reviews.author: Shuddho Sam

reviews.title: Unique and different
reviews.comment: The thing that makes this game unique and sets it apart from the rest is its awesome and mind blowing features.
reviews.author: Jason Moore

reviews.title: Fun based education
reviews.comment: This game is the apt example of fun based education. It shows that which type of games should be created for kids.
reviews.author: Selim Hossain

reviews.title: Need more updates
reviews.comment: I need more updates of this game. I know I am sounding greedy but I need more updates.
reviews.author: Serry Omaha

reviews.title: Spectacular
reviews.comment: This is a spectacular game and looks ravishing. We the whole family are glued with it.
reviews.author: Jack Wallace
